thread.title: The Most Cordial, Comfortable, and Welcome Stay
thread.title_full: The Most Cordial, Comfortable, and Welcome Stay - Review of Rydges Kensington London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 2000familyman
title: The Most Cordial, Comfortable, and Welcome Stay
text:
The staff are extremely friendly, the location is superb, the rooms are very nicely decorated and amenities were very adequate. We felt very welcome from the moment we arrived. They accommodated us to the extent possible because we had a toddler with us. My wife and I had the best vacation of our lives in London. The sunny weather didn't hurt either.
Room Tip: Views of an old church on the other side of the street make it complete. See more room tips
